form.label: Static select drop down and radio buttons

div.h1: Simple XML - Form search with static select dropdown and radio buttons
div.p: In this form search, the search defined with the <searchTemplate> tag defines the selections for the drop down list and radio buttons. The <searchWhenChanged> property allows the change to immediately propogate after selecting the Search button.

The radio buttons are populated from the <populatingSearch>. The <searchWhenChanged> tag propagates any change in selection immediately to the results. Because the form uses a time picker, it does not specify the time range.

div.pre:
<input type="dropdown" token="from"> <label>Select from address</label> <choice value="*">Any</choice> <choice value="*splunk.com">splunk.com</choice> <choice value="*spam*">spam</choice> </input>
<input type="radio" token="size" searchWhenChanged="True"> <label>Select size</label> <prefix>size</prefix> <default>*</default> <choice value="=*">Any</choice> <choice value="=0">0</choice> <choice value=">100">greater than 100</choice> </input>

div.p: For more information on forms, refer to the [Splunk documentation].
